code: import React from'react';import Swal from'sweetalert2';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TarjetasTitulos=_ref=>{let{data}=_ref;const mostrarCertis=datos=>{Swal.fire({width:'50%',backdrop:true,imageUrl:"".concat(process.env.PUBLIC_URL,"/").concat(datos.imagen),imageWidth:'70%',showConfirmButton:false,showClass:{popup:'animate__animated animate__fadeInUp animate__fast'},hideClass:{popup:'animate__animated animate__fadeOutDown animate__fast'}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"contTarjetas",id:"tarjetasCertificaciones",children:data.map((dato,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card",id:"tarjetaCertis",style:{minWidth:'18rem'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",children:dato.nombre}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"card-link botonCertis",onClick:()=>mostrarCertis(dato),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{id:dato.id,className:"imagen",src:"".concat(process.env.PUBLIC_URL,"/").concat(dato.imagen),alt:dato.nombre})})]})},index))});};export default TarjetasTitulos;
